import Mathlib

open Topology Set Filter Metric
open scoped Topology

/-!
Lemma: If f : E â†’ F is differentiable on a convex set U and fderiv is continuous on U,
then the linear approximation error is little-o of h uniformly on compact subsets of U.
This formalizes the usual statement for F : â„^n â†’ â„^n but is stated for normed spaces over â„.
-/

lemma uniform_fderiv_on_compact_of_continuous_on_fderiv {E F : Type*}
  [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E] [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace â„ F]
  {U : Set E} (hU : Convex â„ U) (f : E â†’ F)
  (h_diff : DifferentiableOn â„ f U) (h_cont : ContinuousOn (fun x => fderiv â„ f x) U) :
  âˆ€ K : Set E, IsCompact K â†’ K âŠ† U â†’
    âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ x âˆˆ K, âˆ€ h : E, â€–hâ€– < Î´ â†’ x + h âˆˆ U â†’
      â€–f (x + h) - f x - (fderiv â„ f x : E â†’L[â„] F) hâ€– â‰¤ Îµ * â€–hâ€– :=
by sorry
